sn12.47:1.2: Atha kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.47:3.2: “‘Sabbaṃ natthī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayaṃ dutiyo anto.
sn12.47:3.3: Ete te, brāhmaṇa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti:
sn12.47:4.1: Evaṃ vutte, jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
